params.lp: The address of the LP token
The address of the LP token

params._dev: The address of the LP token

params._seafund: The address of the LP token

params._treasury: The address of the LP token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addBank(address).notice: Adds a bank that this can get fees from

addLPToken(address).notice: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering

addSwapLP(address,address).notice: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering

addToken(address).notice: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering

addYakStrat(address).notice: Adds a yield yak token, to allow withdrawing

allocate().notice: For allocating the revenue to the correct locations.

changeDev(address).notice: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering

changeSeafund(address).notice: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering

changeTreasury(address).notice: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering

getBankCount().notice: Gets the numbers of banks this account controls

getLPTokens().notice: Gets the number of LP tokens this account controls

getTokens().notice: Gets the number of tokens this account controls

getYakCount().notice: Gets the number of yield yak banks (tokens) this account controls

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initializes the Adder. We are doing proxy here as we might add seperate fees that need to be converted later. Easier than changing treasuries over.

transferBankVault(uint256,uint256,addres.notice: for transfering treasury bank vault. Only use if changing contracts.
